verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H8147>me<s%>, and, behold, two <S%H1736>baskets<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%> were <S%H3259>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, with the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths<s%>, from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and had <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, even like the <S%H8384>figs<s%> that are first <S%H1073>ripe<s%>: and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>naughty<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, which could not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they were so <S%H7455>bad<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, What see <S%H3414>you<s%>, Jeremiah? And I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8384>Figs<s%>; the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; and the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, that cannot be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are so <S%H7455>evil<s%>.
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Like these <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, so will I <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> them that are carried away <S%H1546>captive<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, whom I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> out of this <S%H4725>place<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> for their <S%H2896>good<s%>.

For I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon them for <S%H2896>good<s%>, and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to this <S%H776>land<s%>: and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H2040>them<s%>, and not pull them down; and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H5428>them<s%>, and not pluck them up.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, that I am the Lord: and they shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>: for they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto me with their whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

And as the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, which cannot be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are so <S%H7455>evil<s%>; surely thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, So will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that <S%H7604>remain<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, and them that <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

And I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H7451>hurt<s%>, to be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, a <S%H8148>taunt<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, in all <S%H4725>places<s%> where I shall drive <S%H5080>them<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, among <S%H8552>them<s%>, until they be consumed from off the <S%H127>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them and to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
